p: The TPC results of extracts from A. virginicus range from 0.49 to 25.34 mg GAE/g DW. In which, E-Anvi and T-Anvi show the highest TPC of 25.34 and 24.80 mg GAE/g DW, respectively, which are significantly higher than B-Anvi, H-Anvi, and W-Anvi with TPC of 3.26, 1.26, and 0.49 mg GAE/g DW, respectively. Similarly, the highest TFC is found in T-Anvi (37.40 mg RE/g DW). The following fractional extracts including E-Anvi, H-Anvi, B-Anvi, and W-Anvi account for 68.0%, 16.8%, 13.1%, and 0.8%, respectively, in comparison with TFC of T-Anvi ( Table 1).
